data.message:
Eminem, first of all I'd like to thank you for putting out another amazing album. I personally have been listening to MMLP2 on repeat since it dropped. 

My question to you: Do you feel like it's easier to write songs like "Survival", "Rap God" and "The Monster" as opposed to "Legacy" and "Stronger Than I Was" ? 

Thanks for writing music for everyone, about so many different emotions. You're truly an inspiration!! <3
